2011100.name: Space Major Miner
2011100.description:
An asteroid field of full of wealth awaits you! The only problem... the cosmic abominations that dwell in the depths. Use the the resources you mine to upgrade your equipment and perhaps you'll be able to clear the belt of the monstrosities and claim ownership for yourself!

  • Explore and mine procedurally generated asteroids
  • Choose your own path through a randomly generated asteroid field
  • Spend resources to advance and upgrade your equipment using an in depth tech-tree
  • Blast cosmic abominations into the next dimension
  • Rock out to a headbanging soundtrack
  • Overcome unique and challenging boss fights
